text: Today we remember the service members of every race origin religion and creed who lost their lives in service to our country. We are forever indebted to them for their bravery and courage. #MemorialDay http
Today we honor those who made the ultimate sacrifice in defense of our country and of our founding ideals. #MemorialDay
I will stand with my colleagues who want to end gun violence. We want #gunviolenceprevention legislation on the floor now.
